Compatible with iOS 8 to 12.4

AdaptiveColorAlerts is my new Tweak that gives you the visual option to color all the Alerts based on the Wallpaper's Tint.

Banners, Advises and Alerts will be fully fitted everywhere by the Background's Color in use.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Testers: Lorenzo Noide (la Capra), SunnyTM and KSK. Thanks so much Guys!

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, i hope you like it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.

- Added Support Compatibility till iOS 12.4 and arm64e/A12 Devices. - Changes Prefs Labels Descriptions. Version 1.4-3
- Added the option to Make the Borders of the Alerts Square.
Version 1.4-2
- Fixed the Crashes on iOS 9 for some Users.
